Description: CBS Radio agreed to make $2 million in charitable contributions as part of the settlement of allegations that it made payments and provided expensive gifts to radio stations and their employees in return for airplay for the company's songs, a practice known as payola.

Entercom agreed to make $3.5 million in charitable contributions as part of the settlement of allegations that it solicited payments solicited payments from record labels in return for airplay for their songs, a practice known as payola.
